PAYMENT TERMS:
- Net 30 days from invoice date
- 3% discount if paid within 10 days (save $3,285.00)
- Late payment fee: 1.5% per month
- Accepted payment methods: Wire transfer, ACH, Check

PROJECT NOTES:
This invoice covers Phase 1 of the AI transformation project including:
- Development of custom recommendation engine
- Integration with existing customer database
- Real-time data processing pipeline capable of 2M+ requests/day
- Deployment to AWS cloud infrastructure
- 3 months of post-launch support

SPECIAL CONDITIONS:
- Source code repository access will be granted upon 50% payment
- Training workshop scheduled for February 20, 2025
- Performance benchmarks: 99.5% uptime SLA
- Monthly review meetings included in support package

Thank you for your business!
